description: As the leader of Maze, Beverly crafted songs like the slinky, euphoric "Happy Feelin’s" and the breakup anthem "Before I Let Go," wedding his dulcet singing to buoyant grooves.
title: Frankie Beverly, R&B and funk legend, dies at 77

description: Imagine camping out in the woods, taking mushrooms, and meeting your future self ... played by Aubrey Plaza. That's what happens to 18-year-old Elliott (Maisy Stella) in this charming, quirky comedy.
title: A teen meets her middle-aged self in 'My Old Ass' and finds hindsight isn't 20/20

description: All summer, a wide range of hits were in the running for the biggest songs of the season — country singalongs, rap diss tracks, pop kiss-offs and rock epics. But two took the race down to the wire.
title: Summers may come and go, but the songs of the summer last forever

description: Ann Powers considers the breakthrough of indie rock up-and-comer MJ Lenderman, and finds that he’s got some classic rock in his tales of romantic woe.
title: MJ Lenderman joins rock and roll’s lineage of heartbreak kids
